comments.author: Dennis
comments.body: Looks like Mark is hijacking Steve's pseudo leadership by trekking his own path and encouraging unsuspecting alliances. It'll be interesting over time if Mark's semi-veiled mutiny causes a rift in the ranks. Is a friendly duel brewing? Dennis

comments.author: Werner
comments.body: Hmm, it's interesting that Dennis' focus seems to be on mutiny. Perhaps he's been a watchin' a bit too much o' the Black Pearl, and her mutinous crew on his Pirates of the Caribbean DVD. :-) Rumor has it he was seen out cavortin' lst night in Tortuga at a pub hoistin' a tankard of ale and cursin' Captain Barbossa. Maybe that ale put him in a bit of a fog this mornin'.
